# CDA-v1.0 Compliance Statement

**Repository**: lex-omega-omniscient-active-system  
**CDA Version**: 1.0.0  
**Last Validated**: 2025-11-24  
**Validator**: Alexis M. Adams / AxiomHive  

---

## Implementation Details

This deterministic AI governance engine adheres to CDA-v1.0 through axiomatic foundations and Omega Torsion Invariant Framework.

### Transparency (Article II, Section 1)
- ✅ Clear disclosure of system purpose and capabilities
- ✅ Axiomatic foundations explicitly documented
- ✅ Omega Torsion Invariant Framework transparently specified
- ✅ No hidden autonomous behaviors

### Determinism (Article II, Section 2)
- ✅ Axiomatic AI governance (deterministic by design)
- ✅ Omega Torsion Invariant Framework ensures reproducibility
- ✅ No probabilistic inference or stochastic processes
- ✅ Predictable, verifiable operations

### Subservience (Article II, Section 3)
- ✅ Human authority maintained in governance decisions
- ✅ System provides recommendations, not mandates
- ✅ User control over all operational parameters
- ✅ Augments human judgment, doesn't replace it

---

## Validation

- ✅ Article I: Identity and Purpose
- ✅ Article II: Operational Principles
- ✅ Article III: Ethical Boundaries
- ✅ Article IV: Auditability
- ✅ Article V: Implementation Requirements
